title: My cgpa is 5.67 now even after clearing my backlog exams of 5 credit subject with D grade. Backlog results and cgpa updated in same day(june 8) when will my cgpa will get updated ? It's has been more than 2 weeks

comments.body:
go to ESA Results and Previous Semesters, Dont go to Provisional results.  
in Previous semesters column choose the highest semester , you ll have your updated GPA
It's hasn't updated in previous sem column it's still showing 5.67 cgpa
Is it possible to get A or S in a particular subject after clearing itsbacklog
I guess b is the maximum grade we can achieve in backlog exam but iam not sure
I guess the maximum grade u can get from backlog exams is B but i am not sure
No, I know a person (he is doing quite well now) who had a backlog and worked his way to secure S

Hasn't it been done already...you know what result you got. It usually updates close to that. 

It'll say that the results will be updated in 24 hours and you can't view your sem results. 

Or perhaps they're waiting for the summer term exams to finish before updating
